name: Cheesewald Gourmet Adventures
description:
Help Cheesewald on finding food on this 3d platformer adenture

**for web version players: if the mouse cursor is not captured after the cutscene, try pressing p or esc to pause and unpause the game, this should solve the problem, this issue is happening only on web export.

if someone knows how to solve it, please tell me an any comment

WASD - Move

Space - jump

Shift - sprint/dash

P/esc - Pause

The controls also appear in the pause menu
